Troll Under The Bridge Part II
As a long-hidden tribe of trolls living beneath New York City prepares to attack the humans who live above, Skye and Samantha form an uneasy alliance with the Black Knight to try to stop them. Donâ€™t miss Part 2 in the war against the trolls.
